entry.title: Post 1: Website is finally done.
entry.content:
This took longer than it needed to

I don't read blogs and I certainly do NOT write so if this is fucked up then cry about it.
Making this website was extremely easy especially considering it is only css and html, however it was pretty fucking obnoxious.
So to begin, css is literally all testing. If it doesn't look good, change your code, save it, and refresh the page being hosted.
I haven't fucked with html and css since high school so it looks pretty awful rn but it works. Alot will be added as time progresses and Eventually I will be learning php and next.js for future endeavours.
This website will essentially act as my portfolio and I will also be displaying some cool things in the future (stay tuned)
I have been fucking around with this fucking abomination all day, mainly unable to decide on a look and layout until I settled on this one and said fuck it.
This post will be extremely short this time around but in the future I will put more effort into these (I promise you fucking cutie).
If you want me to post about a specific topic just hmu in either bacalhau's discord server or dm me. My discord tag is on the home page
Toodles!
